name: Sandler Partners Revenue Engine
description: Complete 6-phase sales workflow: Prospect Intelligence → Solution Matching → Research Studio Deck → Go-To-Market Strategy → Voice Outreach → Deal Room + Residual Tracking. Optimized for telecom/tech partnership sales.

name: Lead Generation: High-Ranking Businesses Without Websites
description: Scheduled daily/weekly job to identify local businesses ranking in Maps/Search but with no website or weak online presence. Auto-creates leads with instant website mockups.

name: Trademark Infringement → Cease & Desist Drafting
description: Scheduled workflow to scan web for potential trademark infringements. Summarizes candidates, rates risk, and drafts cease-and-desist letters for high-confidence cases (requires human approval before sending).

name: EV Charging Infrastructure Prospecting
description: Scheduled workflow per metro area to identify properties with parking that lack EV chargers. Creates property records, scores opportunities, and generates outreach plans.

name: Event Pre-Meeting Engine
description: Takes a list of event attendees, researches each contact, matches to offerings, generates personalized pre-event outreach, and schedules sends with approval workflow.

name: Content & Social OS
description: Template for brand/initiative content management. Stores campaign plan, pulls trend topics, generates posts/carousels/emails/blogs, and schedules with approval workflow.
